titleInfo.title: ‘Categorically underestimated and excluded’ : Perceptions of and experiences with discrimination at Bielefeld University 2019/2020

bibliographicCitation.mla: Berghan, Wilhelm, Papendick, Michael, Wenk, Esra, Diekmann, Isabell, Pangritz, Johanna, Demir, Zeynep, Thießen, Ann-Kathrin, Meyer zur Heide, Swantje, Rees, Yann, and Rees, Jonas. ‘Categorically underestimated and excluded’ : Perceptions of and experiences with discrimination at Bielefeld University 2019/2020.
